div.p: Hi, my name is Jessica McGovern and I am an Academic Advisor
at the ACCESS program at the Easton Area Campus.
I'd like to give you a little bit more information
on tutoring through the ACCESS program.
The Academic Resource Center, which is located in Room 23 of Dooling Hall,
provides tutoring to ACCESS students for a specific number of classes.
If you need assistance in tutoring with any of your classes please see your academic advisor.
Tutoring is provided for a specific number of classes free of charge to our students
and is handled in group sessions.
